import React from 'react'; const rating=(props)=>{ return(
=1 ? "fas fa-star" : props.rating >=0.5 ? "fas fa-star-half-alt" : "far fa-star" }> =2 ? "fas fa-star" : props.rating >=1.5 ? "fas fa-star-half-alt" : "far fa-star" }> =3 ? "fas fa-star" : props.rating >=2.5 ? "fas fa-star-half-alt" : "far fa-star" }> =4 ? "fas fa-star" : props.rating >=3.5 ? "fas fa-star-half-alt" : "far fa-star" }> =5 ? "fas fa-star" : props.rating >=4.5 ? "fas fa-star-half-alt" : "far fa-star" }> {props.product.numReviews}
) } export default rating;
